channel.title: agave-syrup on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in agave-syrup on Recipes

item.title: Paloma
item.description: Note: There are two recipes, a “simple” one and a “complex” one. Ingredients (simple) 60 ml Tequila 120 ml Grapefruit soda 5 ml Lime juice pinch of salt Instructions (simple) Mix together in a highball glass over ice. Garnish with lime wedge. Ingredients (complex) 45 ml Tequila 30 ml Grapefruit juice 15 ml Lime juice 5 ml Agave syrup splash of Soda water (optional) lime or grapefruit wedge Instructions (complex) Shake ingredients.

item.title: Tommy's margarita
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Tequila 30 ml Lime juice 15 ml Agave syrup lime slice Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a lime slice.
